summary: The video captures a heated exchange during a congressional hearing where Senator Ted Cruz questions Acting Secretary of Homeland Security Alejandro Mayorkas about the security measures provided to former President Donald Trump compared to current President Joe Biden. Cruz emphasizes the disparity in security resources, questioning the rationale behind the difference in the number of Secret Service agents assigned to each former president. The scene includes a tense back-and-forth between the senator and the secretary, highlighting concerns over national security protocols.
keywords: Senator Ted Cruz, Acting Secretary of Homeland Security, Donald Trump, Joe Biden, Secret Service, security, congressional hearing, national security, political debate
